name: Gaseous Server
longDescription:
Gaseous Server is a self-hosted game ROM manager with a built-in web-based emulator. It uses multiple sources to identify and provide metadata for your ROMs, making it easy to organize and play your retro game collection.

Key features include ROM management, metadata fetching from IGDB, in-browser emulation (via EmulatorJS), user authentication, and support for various platforms. It requires a MariaDB or MySQL database and an IGDB API key.

Gaseous Server is designed to be a central hub for your retro gaming library, allowing you to access and play your games from any device with a web browser.
description: Self-hosted game ROM manager with built-in web-based emulator and metadata fetching.
